english.segment1: Let every heart but moves beneath the heavens. Look up to see the light of our redemption. Together Unashamed. To sing the saving name Jesus
english.segment2: Let every hand be lifted unencumbered. To you I only hope our loving Father. To calls us from our sin. From dying to find life again
english.segment3: Pre-Chorus: Come Down. Come Down on Earth. Come Down to Us. Come Down x2
english.segment4: Chorus: Reach us you. Reach us now. With hope for all the broken down. and turn this broken earth. To Holy ground. Come Down. Oh Love Come Down
english.segment5: Your People stand to wait mouth the kingdom. For you will to be done as it is in Heaven. Oh Father Let it come. Let the Radiance sunrise
english.segment8: Come Down. Come Down. Oh Love Come Down to us. Come Down. Come Down
